Description:
Detects execution of binaries located in potentially suspicious locations via "nohup"

Author: Joseliyo Sanchez, @Joseliyo_Jstnk
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Nohup Execution
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%/nohup' and command like '%/tmp/%'
